comments.content: This is amazing! Kudos to this teacher!

description: Kaitlin Gaerig  shared  ABC News 's  video . I absolutely love this.  If I get back into special education, (which I would love to do) I will be starting my day like this.  Such a powerful way to start these students' days while teaching them the power of kind words at the same time.  Such a simple, but amazing idea.  Check it out  Justin Smith ,  Erin Smith ,  Linda Kocevar Alvarez ,  Jennifer Humpal

comments.content: That is a awesome teacher
Every teacher could learn something from this guy

Who is this teacher???  😍  Edit: thanks for all the kind strangers who stood up for me in this thread. You're all great! I'm sorry, while I appreciate the love; I don't accept friend requests from people I don't know. Feel free to follow my boring Instagram if you want haha ... See More
"You are the greatest teacher ever."
This is a teacher. Bravo sir, those kids are lucky to have someone who realises that teachers themselves are the lucky ones to have their students
THIS is what a special Ed teacher looks like. Love this
You are a special teacher, you set the bar very high for other special needs teachers to follow.
Wow what a wonderful teacher praising each student ,one by one......good example, to other educators....love it
All teachers should take up this teacher's methods. Whether children are in a "special education" class or any other class they deserve an excellent caring teacher like this man.
this is awesome and why I work in special education everyday! hats off to the AMAZING teacher!
What a wonderful way for students to start the day! This teacher is what all teachers should be like!
What a gift this teacher is to his students. They will Never forget him!
Amazing teacher! Wish all teachers had more time to tell their students how amazing each one is I. Their own special way
Best lesson this teacher can give to his students!

This guy is an awesome teacher! Having a teacher that makes a student excited to be at school & learn makes all the difference in the way a child learns & this man is doing a fantastic job of leading his classroom
Each teacher needs to teach for each child individually because each child learns differently. This teacher has got it in the bag.
an exceptional special needs teacher! my daughter is a special needs teacher forupper elementary class students and not able to be so touching due to teacher/student space rules....
Proud to have been a special education teacher!
That's a great teacher!!  We need more teacher like this!!
I love this teacher!!!!
What an awesome teacher!
What an awesome teacher.
What an awesome teacher!
A+  ✔️ Lucky children to have a wonderful teacher !

Congratulations to this wonderful teacher!!!  I can't say this to one of my daughter's teachers! He never has anything positive or pleasant coming out of his mouth.  I know of many  wonderful teachers....they love their jobs and love to teach.
Sharing  <3
God bless the teacher...kids must hv such teachers ...Thank u for what ur doing ...We should try this at home

I was a special education teacher for 25 years. The difficulty working in this job is not the students, the are all amazing, it is working with the other teachers to accept them as "learners" and to have the school accept them as students.
What a great teacher A+ indeed... I liked the young man who gave the teacher a compliment...
He's an awesome teacher!!
Wow! A teacher the kids will "always" remember and they will carry this positive teaching on into their lives. High five to this awesome teacher!!  🖐🏽
This is one fabulous teacher.  What an example he is for ALL teachers.
That is one great teacher!
What an awesome teacher!
What a great teacher.
Well done! You are making a difference in those students lives! A teacher they will always remember!  ❤️ ❤️ 👏🏼 👏🏼

You are amazing teacher keep up the good work. We need more teachers like you. God bless you
I love teaching special education 😊 ❤️
God bless our teachers!!! We have some of the best in Birdville! And our special ed teachers changed my daughters life!! Love them!! 👏 🙏 💕

This is such an amazing thing to do. I think this man is a GREAT teacher. Compliments help to improve a child's self-esteem.
Great teacher! His students will remember him.

description: Kaitlin Gaerig Everyday I keep hoping and hoping that this woman will not be in charge of the department of education.  As a public school teacher, I literally see this woman as poison.  Should a billionaire really be in charge of education when most educators barely make a livable wage?  This woman has no idea what it means or feels like to be an educator.  She has shown in her confirmation hearings that she does not have what is best for public schools in mind as well as showing a remarkable ignorance to basic educational terms and laws.  We need someone in charge of the department of education who is willing to look at the problems public schools face and tackle them head on instead of sweeping them under the rug and ignoring them.  The children of the United States deserve better than Betsy DeVos.

description: Kaitlin Gaerig I had a student tell me today that I was the best teacher he's had because I say things in a nice way.  His example was, "When I'm leaning back in my chair, you don't say, "No, don't do that." You just tell me to keep my chair on the floor."  I guess all of those trainings I've been to that tell you to phrase things in a positive manner with the desirable behavior as the focus were right on and even a six year noticed.  Stay positive friends  ✌🏼  The littlest of minds catch on to these things.

description: Kaitlin Gaerig So a student of mine is getting ready to take an A.R. Test and he raises his hand.  His book was titled "Polar Bears."  Here's the conversation:  Student: "I don't know which "Polar Bears" book to click on.  There are so many of them."   Me: "Let's type in the author too so it's easier to find." (Clicks on book to set up A.R. Test for student."   Student: "Also, I have to go to the bathroom."  Me: "Well, do you want to go now or take your test first?"  Student: (thinks about it) "I should probably go first because I almost just peed my pants."    🤦🏼‍♀️ 🤦🏼‍♀️ 🤦🏼‍♀️
